import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { collection, addDoc } from 'firebase/firestore' import { db } from '../firebaseConfig/firebase' const Create = () => { const [ heroe, setHeroe ] = useState('') const [ nombre, setNombre ] = useState('') const [ edad, setEdad ] = useState(0) const [ origen, setOrigen ] = useState('') const [ enemigos, setEnemigos ] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const HeroesCollection = collection(db, "superheroe") const supers = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await addDoc( HeroesCollection, { heroe: heroe, nombre: nombre, edad: edad, origen: origen, descripcion: descripcion, enemigos: enemigos } ) navigate('/heroes') } return (

Heroe

setHeroe(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' required />
setNombre(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' required />
setEdad(e.target.value)} type="number" className='form-control' required />
setSexo(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' required />
setOrigen(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' required />
setEnemigos(e.target.value)} type="text" className='form-control' required />
) } export default Create
